title: L'invitee = the Guest
creator_credit: Jean-Roch Rognoni and Vittorio De Seta
brief_description:
When she discovers her husband has come home with a mistress, Anne leaves her home in Paris and spends the night in her office where she meets Francois, an architect. Without further ado, Francois invites her to a business trip to the South of France.

Credits: Producer, Jean-Roch Rognoni ; director, Vittorio De Seta; writers, Lucile Laks, Tonino Guerra, Frantz Andre Burguet, Vittorio De Seta, Monique Lange ; photography, Luciano Tovoli ; music, Georges Garvarentz.
Cast: Michel Piccoli, Joanna Shimkus, Jacques Perrin, Lorna Heilbron, Paul Barge, Clotilde Joanno, Jacques Rispal.
